title: Yalantis WatchFace
description: Handcrafted with love at Yalantis, this clean watch face featuring minimalistic design style will look great on any smartwatch! The elements on the watch face are designed to meet all requirements to the image volume. Colors, shadows, and gradients create the impression of a traditional mechanical device. Yellow and blue colors on the heart are symbolic colors of Ukrainian national flag, the country where the watch faceâ€™s developers come from.The watch face has native support for ambient screen. descriptionHTML:
Handcrafted with love at Yalantis, this clean watch face featuring minimalistic design style will look great on any smartwatch! The elements on the watch face are designed to meet all requirements to the image volume. Colors, shadows, and gradients create the impression of a traditional mechanical device. Yellow and blue colors on the heart are symbolic colors of Ukrainian national flag, the country where the watch face’s developers come from.

The watch face has native support for ambient screen. The optimised dimmed mode of Yalantis watch face will guarantee a minimal battery usage.

Download our free watch face to enjoy it on your smartwatch.
comments: I don't know how to use it
Very nice but showing date would be great
